Industries: Developer APIs, Enterprise Software, Reading Apps
Industry Groups: Apps, Software
Description: Asym Spacing is a word-spacing format for web & print that significantly increases reading enjoyment, ad click-throughs, and conversions.
Full Description: Asymmetrica has created a text format that meaningfully improves reading comprehension. Our software platform, Asym, precisely adjusts the spaces between words.  Our vision is to improve global literacy one reader and business at a time. For businesses, Asym provides a 5-32% lift across retail revenue, conversion funnels, web engagement, advertisement click-through rates, direct mail, and other content by improving how readers' brains render text. These metrics are the cornerstones of online revenue generation. Asym is a cognitive technology that systematically improves conversion and makes the story and message of online brands stick. Asymmetrica is poised to become a large, high-margin company by generating real revenue for a broad range of customers. Asymmetrica was founded by Chris Nicholas and Ken Brownfield within HVF Labs, Max Levchin's innovation lab and investment firm. Chris has a PhD in neuroscience and is an experienced data scientist, published expert in molecular genetics and word & letter perception, product manager, and co-inventor of five typesetting patents including fixed-layout ebooks. Starting in 1999, Ken built out PayPal's initial production infrastructure and continued with architectural roles at PayPal and eBay. He subsequently worked with Max at MRL Ventures, Slide, and Google, and most recently managed YouTube's website infrastructure. Our foundational technology is fast, scalable, and directly combats modern distractions and low literacy – two real and underestimated problems for any content provider.

Full Description: BeeLine Reader makes reading faster and easier by using a color gradient that guides the eyes from the end of one line to the beginning of the next. With BeeLine Reader, students can finish work faster and with less eyestrain. The company's goal is to make those hours more efficient and more enjoyable. BeeLine Reader was founded on 2011 and is based in Woodside, California.

Their library of interactive stories helps their child fall in love with reading while building critical skills.  BEGiN’s investors and partners include some of the most recognized and well-loved children’s brands including Sesame Workshop, LEGO Ventures, Gymboree Play and Music, and Fisher-Price. Full Description: Book+Main is an online platform that uses machine learning to connect authors and readers in romance—the #1 grossing genre. A sales and marketing tool for authors, a discovery tool for readers, and a robust community that connects the two, Book+Main allows readers to search over 350 keywords {subgenres and tropes} to discover ‘Bites’, excerpts specifically chosen by the author to connect readers to their words in a beautiful, content-focused space. Since launching in November ’17, Book+Main has welcomed members from over 150 countries worldwide.

Its cloud-based reading platform provides an easy-to-use experience for both mobile and web readers. Its application provides both standard features such as bookmarking, notes, and many new innovative ones such as speed-reading and daily progress. Description: Bubblin is an online café for books.
Full Description: Bubblin is an online café for books. A silent and cozy place to hang out and read great books. By silent we mean no pesky advertisements, no unsolicited comments, no promotional opinions or overarching reviews and only very limited social networking: just about enough to share interests with other like-minded book lovers privately. Rediscover yourself in the quiet company of books. Learn more about us: https://bubbl.in/about

Description: Charmtech Labs was founded in 2010 by a group of CS professors and Ph.D. students who wanted to make a difference in the real world.
Full Description: Charmtech Labs LLC was founded in 2010 by a group of computer science professors and Ph.D. students who wanted to go beyond academic research and make a difference in the real world. Armed with years of cutting-edge research and software development experience, they set out to remove barriers between people and information. Initially inspired by helping people with vision impairments to overcome information accessibility problems, they are now bringing their screen-reading technology to the mainstream market. Their flagship product, Capti Narrator, revolutionizes the way people consume digital content.

Description: Comixology delivers a cloud-based digital comics platform that enables users to discover, buy, and read comics.
Full Description: Founded in 2007 with the mission of bringing comics to people everywhere, comiXology — in just five short years — has revolutionized the comic book and graphic novel world. From creating the industry leading platform for digital comics to tools and services for brick and mortar retailers, comiXology has lead the charge in exposing new audiences to the rich history and culture of comic books.  With the development of the Comics by comiXology digital comics platform — available across iPhone, iPad, Android, Kindle Fire and the Web — comiXology provides the easiest way worldwide for people to enjoy comics at just the click of a button! Regularly ranking as the top grossing iPad app in the entire iTunes App Store, Comics by comiXology was recently selected as a preloaded app on Amazon’s Kindle Fire.  Providing digital comics across multiple platforms, comiXology will not stop until everyone on the face of the earth has been turned into a comic book fan. For more information, please visit www.comixology.com.

Feedly is the app that connects curious minds with the blogs, websites and sources of content they are most passionate about. Description: HOMER is a developer of an educational application used to offer a learn-to-read program for kids.
Full Description: HOMER is a developer of an educational application used to offer a learn-to-read program for kids. The company offers personalized, fun, and proven to learn products for kids ages 2-8 to help build confidence, mastery, and a love of learning. Its learning experts have crafted the HOMER Method to support parents in delivering knowledge, personal development, and motivation, a recipe for growing, enthusiastic, lifelong learners. HOMER combines a child’s passions and current reading level to create a personalized learn-to-read plan on their Android phone or tablet. It includes thousands of lessons and games on the alphabet, phonics, sight words, and more. HOMER was founded in 2013 and is based in New York, NY, USA.

Description: Kids Discover is an educational publisher offering high-quality science and social studies reading for K-8 learners and educators.
Full Description: Kids Discover Online (KDO) gives teachers and students the opportunity to browse Kids Discover’s vast library of science and social studies content, photographs, activities, and interactive simulations in an individualized, organized platform. Kids Discover Online content is offered a 3 different Lexile(R) Reading Levels, and is aligned with Common Core, State, and Next Generation Science Standards.  Using Kids Discover Online provides teachers with pre-designed individual lessons or entire unit plans. Students use the tool to complete individualized, level-appropriate readings or activities assigned by the teacher. Activities and assignments are organized by singular interest topics or pre-designed unit plans.  Both teachers and students can customize their search interests and queue future lessons, units, and activities. Teachers can assign students interactive activities or reading assignments based on the student’s Lexile reading level. Students can then complete these assignments or activities at their own pace within KDO, and are free to explore other Kids Discover content based on their own interests.

Their goal is to give creators the freedom to escape from the traditional confines of 21 static pages, and create a new world of words, pictures, motion and sound. The Madefire app unites the artistry of comics and graphic novels with the iPad’s groundbreaking interactive capabilities. Description: MagicBox is a SaaS based tool empowering publishers to package, sell, manage, & distribute their digital contents.
Full Description: MagicBox is a Leading SaaS based mobile distribution platform for publishers to securely package, sell, manage, & distribute their digital contents across multiple platforms – both online and offline.  MagicBox empowers publishers to create interactive and media-rich digital content themselves with just a few clicks and without any need of technical expertise or expensive outsourcing. It also offers a one stop platform to sell digital content to their customers using its e-commerce content store, handle license management as well as deliver content to students on white-labeled interactive reading apps that they can use on their PCs, smartphones or any tablets. In addition, It offers an advance assessment tool for publishers, schools and teachers to create online assessments inside the books or as a stand-alone exercise for students. Since its launch in late 2013, MagicBox has generated significant traction in the industry and has close to 1 million users.

Launched in April 2010 by Wandy Yeap Hoh and David Park after 16 months of research and development, MeeGenius digitizes children's stories, classic and new, and adds features such as word highlighting and audio playback for easy read-along. Also available on certain platforms are text and audio personalization tools, which further engage young readers.

Description: We bring a revolutionary tool for simple reading, publishing and distribution of digital comics.
Full Description: Nanits brings comic books to life! This revolutionary platform makes the comic reading experience richer than ever. Original soundtracks, illusion of 3D depth, and page free scrolling - everything that you expect from real digital comics in the 21st century, a modern, fully digital experience. For indie comic book artists, Nanits offers a new solution to create and distribute digital comics - Nanits Composer. The new tool allows artists to upload their digital comics, overlay them onto an interactive, visual storyboard and add an original produced soundtrack from the Nanits Universe bank. Once approved, the comic is published and available immediately on the Nanits Reader iOS or Android application. The artist has the opportunity to earn up to 70% of the sales of their digital comic books on the Nanits Reader application.

Description: Plympton is a literary studio that innovates in digital publishing.
Full Description: DailyLit, their consumer-facing product, consists of a team of publishers, product designers and engineers on a mission to bring the best fiction and non-fiction to the world's 600 million smartphones and tablets. And they do it in a way that fits into daily life's small moments. They are the only team that combines world-class software engineers (MIT, ex-Palantir) with an eminent editorial staff (New York Times-bestselling author) that has relationships with publishers of the world's best writers. Their library has included stories from: - Alice Munro, Nobel Prize winner  - Jhumpa Lahiri, Pulitzer Prize Winner  - Julia Glass, National Book Award Winner  - John Grisham, 250 million+ books sold Acquired by Plympton in spring 2013, DailyLit was founded 2006 by USV Partner Albert Wenger and Susan Danziger. It has grown to 200,000 users and a mailing list of 150,000. We are building a next-generation mobile e-reading app focused on curated selections—shorter form and serialized—for subscription.

Description: Radish is a mobile fiction platform for serialized storytelling.
Full Description: Radish is a mobile fiction platform for serialized storytelling. Its wide variety of stories are published and read in bite-sized installments optimized for the smartphone reader. Radish is revolutionizing the way that stories are consumed and produced. Readers can access thousand of serials across genres and connect directly with their favorite storytellers in live community chat rooms. Authors can publish their own original stories, revive backlist titles with a young, mobile readership, and pre-release upcoming books to build advanced buzz—the opportunities are endless!

Industries: EdTech, Education, Publishing, Reading Apps, Social Assistance
Industry Groups: Apps, Content and Publishing, Education, Government and Military, Media and Entertainment, Software
Description: Read Naturally's innovative, research-proven reading programs provide high-quality interventions and differentiated instruction.
Full Description: Read Naturally's innovative, research-proven reading programs provide high-quality interventions and differentiated instruction for struggling readers of all ages and abilities – whether special education, ELL, Title I, mainstream, or adult – to improve reading skills, gain confidence and transform attitudes toward school and learning. Read Live, our most popular intervention and assessment tool, uses a powerful web-technology platform providing administrators the ability to easily deploy these programs on a single computer or across an entire district. Read Live features a reading intervention, Read Naturally Live and an assessment tool, Benchmark Assessor Live. Students work mostly independently in Read Naturally Live by reading high-interest, nonfiction stories and completing a number of activities including a vocabulary-boosting game, Wordtastic. This motivating and engaging curriculum and format builds students'​ fluency, vocabulary, comprehension and phonics skills. Read Naturally launched two new programs in 2014, Funēmics and Splat-O-Nym. Funēmics teaches the foundational skills of phonemic awareness to small groups of pre-readers or struggling readers. Students gain awareness of words’ syllables, rhyming, phonemes and phoneme manipulation using scripted lessons that correspond to interactive exercises displayed for students on an iPad. Splat-O-Nym is an iPad app designed to build vocabulary. Students independently play games that include over 7,000 synonym questions, 1,000 antonym questions, and 600 meaning-from-context questions. Other research-based interventions programs from Read Naturally include: Read Naturally GATE, Signs for Sounds, Word Warm-ups, One Minute Reader and Take Aim! at Vocabulary.

Description: Serial Box is an entertainment company that provides serialized entertainment for readers and listeners.
Full Description: Serial Box is an entertainment company that provides serialized entertainment for readers and listeners. The company creates short, immersive stories that you can listen to or read. They produce completely original series and tell official new stories around story worlds like BBC's Orphan Black and characters like Marvel's Black Panther and Jessica Jones. Serial Box is designed for consumption on smartphones in either an audiobook or e-book format, users can read or listen to each weekly episodic installment. Description: The Hawaii Project is a personalized book recommendation engine. We find great books you'd never find on your own.
Full Description: The Hawaii Project are the makers of Bookship (https://www.bookshipapp.com), a social reading app. Bookship was shortlisted by The Bookseller for BookTech Company of the Year. They are also the creators of The Hawaii Project, a personalized book recommendation engine. The Hawaii Project finds great books you'd never find on your own - matching your personal interests to what leading tastemakers around the web are writing about. Follow authors, subscribe to our unique channels, and mark books you've read, loved or want. We'll do the rest, delivering you great recommendations and alerts about interesting books and book news from around the web! Our basic service is free. Premium Accounts let you follow more authors and get extra features. 10% of our revenue goes to fund 3 great literacy non-profits.

Description: Workers On Call is an outsourced worker site helping companies find skilled workers who are available and ready to start working.
Full Description: Workers On Call is an outsourced worker site designed to help companies start work now. If you need work done immediately you will be matched with skilled workers who are available and ready to start immediately. Forget spending hours reading applications or waiting for responses. See who is online now, how long they have left to work and chat live with them about your project. Hiring takes less than 15 minutes. We all know how many jobs we have in a day. Description: Daily personalized bible quotes.
Full Description: Your Bible Quotes is owned and operated by Certatim.  They’re a small software development company based out of Miami Beach and have a number of software products that they offer for small businesses.  They also work on custom development for clients. Their idea came from a desire to make access to the Bible easier in what seems like an ever busier and rushed society.  Wouldn’t it be nice to just take a minute to read a Bible Quote selected for you each day?  Take a step back from your daily grind and think about what’s important? They realized there is less and less time of each day for themselves and for you as an individual.  They wanted to build a way for you to be able to set aside 5 minutes to reflect on a Bible Quote.  Simple, personalized Bible Quotes delivered daily.  It’s that simple.
